column1: Bir El Djir is a town located close north-east of Oran in the Oran Province
column2: Algeria. According to the 2009 census it has a population of 171

column1: Bir El Djir hosts the University of Oran 2 Mohamed Ben Ahmed
Bir El Djir is one of the three venues that will held the  2021 Mediterranean Games in Oran.
